LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Alerts.NoTableLabel: Need manager's desk or AI manager
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Alerts.NoTable: Manager jobs exist, but no manager's desk or AI manager has been constructed.\n\n(Click to build {0})
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Alerts.NoManager: Manager jobs exist, but no pawn has the managing job enabled, nor has an AI manager been constructed.\n\n(Click to open work window)
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Alerts.ManagerDeskAnd: Because you have an AI manager that autonomously runs manager jobs, having a manager's desk is superfluous and it will not be used by colonists.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Alerts.AutoslaughterO: You have configured both a Colony Manager livestock job and RimWorld's auto-slaughter to be responsible for maintaining animal count targets for one or more animals. These two systems will likely be in conflict, and you should either turn off the '{0}' setting for the manager job(s), or turn off auto-slaughter for the given animal(s). The animals that have an overlap are:\n\n{1}
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Alerts.JobsNotUpdatin: You have manager jobs configured that haven't been updated in over {0} since they were due for an update. Make sure your managers aren't so busy with other tasks that they don't have time to update your manager jobs.\n\n(Click to open work window)
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Common.Expensive.Tip: Enabling this setting may decrease performance, particularly on large maps, mountainous maps, jobs with many potential targets, and colonies with high numbers of colonists.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.NeverUpdatedToolt: This job has never been updated.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.LastUpdatedToolti: This job was last updated {0} ago.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.ScheduledToBeUpda: It is scheduled to be updated every {0}.
As the job is suspended, it won't currently be updated, but if it weren't suspended it would be scheduled to be updated every {0}.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.ClickToChangeUpda: Click to force an update now or to change the update interval.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.AlreadyUpdatingOr: job is already due for an update or suspended
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.JobHasBeenSuspend: Job has been suspended due to an exception. Unless the cause of exception has been sorted out, unsuspending it may cause another exception immediately.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Job.CausedException: This job has been suspended because it caused an exception:\n\n{0}.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Threshold.CheckReacha: Calculate if a path to the target exists (for any pawn) before creating a designation.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Threshold.PathBasedDi: Calculate distance based on actual path

If enabled, distances will be calculated based on real paths. If disabled, distances will be calculated 'as the crow flies'. \n\nNOTE: Enabling this option on jobs with a large amount of possible targets may lead to significant lag spikes.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Threshold.CountAllOnM: If enabled, counts all items allowed by the threshold filter on the map. If disabled, counts only those in stockpiles and storage buildings.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.CannotManage.NoActive: no jobs require updates right now
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.CannotManage.AIManage: managers won't do manual managing work when an AI manager is active
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.CleanJobComplete: Removed {0} in-progress designations due to the job being completed ({1} before / {2} after)
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.NoWorkDone: Job reported it got no work done, and provided no more details
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.CleanAreaDesigna: Removed {0} invalid designations ({1} missing target / {2} outside configured {3} area)
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.AddRelevantGameD: Found and added {0} {1} designations that weren't already being tracked
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.CurrentCount: Current count / target before adding new designations: {0} / {1}
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.TargetsAlreadySa: Job targets are already expected to be satisfied with its current designations; making no changes
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.NoValidTargets: No currently undesignated {0} to designate for {1}
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.AddDesignation: Added new {0} designation for {1} {2} with expected yield {3}, bringing expected count / target to {4} / {5}
